pullrequest.title: quickstep split into quickstep, PGS, CG

content.raw:
This looks good; I just have a couple possible changes that I will paste as a diff:
~~~
diff -r 33cf445c4fdc deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.cpp
--- a/deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.cpp	Mon Mar 02 17:15:46 2015 -0800
+++ b/deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.cpp	Tue Mar 03 14:26:50 2015 -0800
@@ -129,14 +129,11 @@
 #endif
 }
 
-#endif 
-
-#ifdef USE_CG_LCP
-size_t quickstep::EstimateGR_LCPMemoryRequirements(int m);
+size_t quickstep::EstimateGR_LCPMemoryRequirements(int m)
 {
   size_t res = dEFFICIENT_SIZE(sizeof(dReal) * 12 * m); // for iMJ
   res += 5 * dEFFICIENT_SIZE(sizeof(dReal) * m); // for r, z, p, q, Ad
   return res;
 }
-#endif 
- 
\ No newline at end of file
+#endif
+
diff -r 33cf445c4fdc deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.h
--- a/deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.h	Mon Mar 02 17:15:46 2015 -0800
+++ b/deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.h	Tue Mar 03 14:26:50 2015 -0800
@@ -27,18 +27,17 @@
 #include "quickstep_util.h"
  
 namespace ode {
-    namespace quickstep{
+  namespace quickstep{
 #ifdef USE_CG_LCP
-  void CG_LCP (dxWorldProcessContext *context,
-  int m, int nb, dRealMutablePtr J, int *jb, dxBody * const *body,
-  dRealPtr invMOI, dRealMutablePtr lambda, dRealMutablePtr cforce, dRealMutablePtr rhs,
-  dRealMutablePtr lo, dRealMutablePtr hi, dRealPtr cfm, int *findex,
-  dxQuickStepParameters *qs); 
-#endif 
+    void CG_LCP (dxWorldProcessContext *context,
+      int m, int nb, dRealMutablePtr J, int *jb, dxBody * const *body,
+      dRealPtr invMOI, dRealMutablePtr lambda, dRealMutablePtr cforce,
+      dRealMutablePtr rhs,
+      dRealMutablePtr lo, dRealMutablePtr hi, dRealPtr cfm, int *findex,
+      dxQuickStepParameters *qs); 
 
-#ifdef USE_CG_LCP
-size_t quickstep::EstimateGR_LCPMemoryRequirements(int m);
+    size_t quickstep::EstimateGR_LCPMemoryRequirements(int m);
 #endif
-    } // namespace quickstep
+  } // namespace quickstep
 } // namespace ode
 #endif
~~~
content.html:
This looks good; I just have a couple possible changes that I will paste as a diff:

diff -r 33cf445c4fdc deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.cpp
--- a/deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.cpp  Mon Mar 02 17:15:46 2015 -0800
+++ b/deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.cpp  Tue Mar 03 14:26:50 2015 -0800
@@ -129,14 +129,11 @@
 #endif
 }

-#endif 
-
-#ifdef USE_CG_LCP
-size_t quickstep::EstimateGR_LCPMemoryRequirements(int m);
+size_t quickstep::EstimateGR_LCPMemoryRequirements(int m)
 {
   size_t res = dEFFICIENT_SIZE(sizeof(dReal) * 12 * m); // for iMJ
   res += 5 * dEFFICIENT_SIZE(sizeof(dReal) * m); // for r, z, p, q, Ad
   return res;
 }
-#endif 
- 
\ No newline at end of file
+#endif
+
diff -r 33cf445c4fdc deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.h
--- a/deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.h    Mon Mar 02 17:15:46 2015 -0800
+++ b/deps/opende/src/quickstep_cg_lcp.h    Tue Mar 03 14:26:50 2015 -0800
@@ -27,18 +27,17 @@
 #include "quickstep_util.h"

 namespace ode {
-    namespace quickstep{
+  namespace quickstep{
 #ifdef USE_CG_LCP
-  void CG_LCP (dxWorldProcessContext *context,
-  int m, int nb, dRealMutablePtr J, int *jb, dxBody * const *body,
-  dRealPtr invMOI, dRealMutablePtr lambda, dRealMutablePtr cforce, dRealMutablePtr rhs,
-  dRealMutablePtr lo, dRealMutablePtr hi, dRealPtr cfm, int *findex,
-  dxQuickStepParameters *qs); 
-#endif 
+    void CG_LCP (dxWorldProcessContext *context,
+      int m, int nb, dRealMutablePtr J, int *jb, dxBody * const *body,
+      dRealPtr invMOI, dRealMutablePtr lambda, dRealMutablePtr cforce,
+      dRealMutablePtr rhs,
+      dRealMutablePtr lo, dRealMutablePtr hi, dRealPtr cfm, int *findex,
+      dxQuickStepParameters *qs); 

-#ifdef USE_CG_LCP
-size_t quickstep::EstimateGR_LCPMemoryRequirements(int m);
+    size_t quickstep::EstimateGR_LCPMemoryRequirements(int m);
 #endif
-    } // namespace quickstep
+  } // namespace quickstep
 } // namespace ode
 #endif
